modName: Standalone Emerald Sapphire and Black Wolf Robes by Olaffsen
summary:
A few coloured robes with a chainmail undershirt and brown sash belt depicted with a shoulder width (coloured) snarling wolf on the back. Feedback is welcome! :)

*This is a standalone mod.

It is worth noting that this robe only shows up on MALE CHARACTERS if put on a female character it will show the original novice robe that this was created
descriptionHtml:
A few coloured robes with a chainmail undershirt and brown sash belt depicted with a shoulder width (coloured) snarling wolf on the back. Feedback is welcome! :)

*This is a standalone mod.

It is worth noting that this robe only shows up on MALE CHARACTERS if put on a female character it will show the original novice robe that this was created from.

Change-log, Current version:- 1.3
Version 1.3
Uploaded an optional Black/Colourless version of the original mod  

Version 1.2
Uploaded an optional Sapphire version of the original mod  

Version 1
Uploaded Emerald Wolf Robe  

P.S Version 1.4 will include a Crimson (Red) version of this robe.
author: Olaffsen

files.name: Sapphire Wolf Robe
files.changelogHtml: Uploaded an optional Sapphire version of the original mod

files.name: Black Wolf Robe
files.changelogHtml: Uploaded an optional Black/Colourless version of the original mod
